name: Introduction to Gender & Sexuality Studies
description: A course exploring the history and theories of gender and sexuality studies.

name: Gender & Sexuality in History
description: An overview of how gender and sexuality have been understood in different historical contexts.

name: Introduction to Masculinity Studies
description: An introduction to the concepts and theories of masculinity studies, including its intersections with other fields.

name: Masculinity & Media
description: A study of how gender roles and expressions are portrayed and reinforced in different media forms.

name: Masculinity & Society
description: An exploration of the social and cultural construction of masculinity and how masculinity is used to shape social institutions and norms.

name: Research Methods in Masculinity Studies
description: A course on the different research methods and approaches commonly used in Masculinity Studies.
